clinic_removed_fail: Could not remove clinic from favorites. Try again.
clinic_save_fail: Could not save clinic to favorites. Login and try again.
not_logged_in_alert: You must be logged in to view this page
location_error_message: Could not fetch location. Please check your settings.
choose_distance_info: The results are always filtered to show the clinic closest to you first
email_type_message: Please enter a valid email address
password_least_characters: Password must be at least 6 characters
name: Name
findvet-page-intro: Here you can search for and find contact information for your nearest veterinarian.
about_hittavet_text_1: HittaVet is a user-friendly app that makes it easy to find veterinary clinics based on name, city, county, or your current location.
about_hittavet_text_2: The app shows clinics near you and prioritizes open clinics, so you can always find help when you need it.
about_hittavet_text_3: By creating an account, you can save your favorite clinics and leave reviews for other users to read.
about_hittavet_text_4: HittaVet makes it easy to access the right care for your pet and share experiences with other pet owners.
no_reviews: No reviews available for this clinic.
login_required: You must be logged in to add a review.
